alert.note: Alert for Deaf Smith; Palo Duro Canyon; Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 6:47PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Randall, east central Deaf Smith and southeastern Potter Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 646 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Umbarger, or 8 miles west of Canyon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Canyon, Lake Tanglewood, Mescalero Park, Buffalo Lake, Dawn, Umbarger and Timbercreek Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
